title: Walnut Grove (Gallatin, Tennessee)
text: The Walnut Grove is a historic mansion in <a href="Gallatin%2C%20Tennessee">Gallatin, Tennessee</a>, U.S.. It was built circa 1800, and expanded in the 1820s. The original owner was Charles Elliott, and his brother Elliott lived at <a href="Wall%20Spring">Wall Spring</a> nearby. It includes a portico, and a staircase designed in the <a href="Federal%20architecture">Federal style</a>. It has been listed on the <a href="National%20Register%20of%20Historic%20Places%20listings%20in%20Sumner%20County%2C%20Tennessee">National Register of Historic Places</a> since December 29, 1978.
